# Project Overview

# Logger Website

The Logger website is the public-facing marketing and informational site for the Logger platform. It provides an overview of features, pricing, FAQs, documentation, and contact/support information. The site is SEO-optimized and designed for high performance and responsiveness.

## Folder Structure

# Recommended Structure

```
website/
├── pages/           # Next.js pages (Home, About, Pricing, FAQ, Contact)
├── components/      # Reusable React components
├── public/          # Static assets (images, favicon, etc.)
├── styles/          # Tailwind CSS and custom styles
├── seo/             # SEO configuration (Next SEO, sitemap)
├── docs/            # Documentation and guides
└── ...
```

## Libraries and Frameworks already installed

# Tech Stack

-   **Next.js**: React-based framework for SSR and SEO
-   **Tailwind CSS**: Utility-first CSS for responsive design
-   **Next SEO**: SEO metadata management
-   **Sitemap**: Automatic sitemap generation

## Coding Standards

# Guidelines

-   Use functional React components and hooks
-   Organize code by feature and component
-   Write clear, SEO-optimized content
-   Use Tailwind CSS for styling
-   Keep pages and components modular and reusable
-   Follow Next.js routing conventions

## UI guidelines

# UI/UX Principles

-   Fully responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop
-   Prominent CTAs (Sign Up, Learn More, Demo)
-   Clean, modern design with clear typography
-   Fast load times and optimized images
-   Accessible navigation and forms
-   Consistent color palette and branding
